document.text:
From: (USANYS)" 
To: (USANYS)" <MIMMIE> 
Subject: RE: Filing today 
Date: Thu, 13 Aug 2020 20:42:22 +0000 
No worries. Believe me, I sympathize. For what it's worth, I turned on "Wi-Fi Calling" in my Settings and it 
made a huge difference. 
 Ori inal Messa e 
From: 
(USANYS) 
Sent: Thursda , August 13, 2020 4:41 PM 
To: 
(USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Filing today 
Ok. Sony to miss the calls . Have been working in basement for last couple hours where I  get no cell service. 
 Original Message 
From: 
(USANYS) 
Sent: Thursda , Au ust 13, 2020 4:40 PM 
To: 
(HSANYS) 
Subject: RE: Filing today 
I would have reached out to them directly if I didn't share the concern. With your confirmation as reinforcement, 
I called her back and she completely agrees that and have got it 
covered. 
 Original Messa e 
From: 
(USANYS) <MMIMIN> 
Sent: Thursda , August 13, 2020 4:36 PM 
To: 
(USANYS)
Subject: RE: Filing today 
I didn't ask because I  thought it was honestly heavy handed. You really think we should? 
 Original Message 
From: 
(USANYS) <Ma 
Sent: Thursda , Au ust 13, 2020 4:35 PM 
To: 
(USANYS)<MIMMIN> 
Subject: RE: Filing today 
just called (she'd tried you first since it was Maxwell). She'd like us ou and me) to have eyes on the 
draft if possible before it's filed. Think you can swing that with and 
 Ori inal Messa e 
From: (USANYS) 
<MIMMIN> 
Sent: Thursda Au ust 13, 2020 4:33 PM 
To: (USANYS (USANYS) 
<MIMIN>: 
(USANYS) 
Subject: FW: Filing today 
FYI, BOP is not moving her to general population as requested in the motion, and our response will argue that 
the court should defer to the BOP and its determination as to what is necessary, but the team has been working 
EFTA00015893

with the BOP to increase her computer/discovery access, which was the principal way she argued she was being 
impacted by her restrictive conditions. 
 Original Messa e 
From: (USANYS) [Contractor] <==MMIE> 
Sent: Thursda Au ust 13 2020 4:29 PM 
To: 
(USANYS 
Cc: 
(USANYS 
USANYS) 
(USANYS) (USANYS) 
Subject: Filing today 
I understand you're supposed to be filing a response today (by 5:00?) to a defense motion to have Maxwell 
released to the general population at MDC, or at least to be detained under conditions they say would allow her 
greater access to a computer and the opportunity to review discovery materials? Main (OPA) is keenly interested 
because of the AG's response last summer to Epstein's suicide and his bow to overhaul BOP and ensure inmate 
safety, so a guy down there asked if we could send him what you file as soon as you do. (Apparently the AG is 
getting questions from Congressional Republicans about what's being done to ensure Maxwell's safety.) 
Chief Public Information Officer 
U.S. 
Attorney's Office SDNY 
(office) 
(cell) 
EFTA00015894
